mapper.update: update settlement_interest_log set settlement_interest_log_time = #{time,jdbcType=DATE}, settlement_interest_log_card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=CHAR}, settlement_interest_log_interest = #{interest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, settlement_interest_log_cumulative_interest = #{cumulativeInterest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, settlement_interest_log_last_time = #{lastTime,jdbcType=DATE} where settlement_interest_log_serial = #{serial,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select settlement_interest_log_serial, settlement_interest_log_time, settlement_interest_log_card_id, settlement_interest_log_interest, settlement_interest_log_cumulative_interest, settlement_interest_log_last_time from settlement_interest_log where settlement_interest_log_serial = #{serial,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select settlement_interest_log_serial, settlement_interest_log_time, settlement_interest_log_card_id, settlement_interest_log_interest, settlement_interest_log_cumulative_interest, settlement_interest_log_last_time from settlement_interest_log
